The Shayzien platebody (4) is a platebody that requires 20 Defence to equip, and is part of the Shayzien armour (tier 4) set. In order to receive the armour, players must have at least 90% Shayzien favour.

It is dropped by the tier 4 soldier at the Combat Ring in the Shayzien Encampment.

[[File:Shayzien platebody (4) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''Shayzien platebody (4)''' is a platebody that requires 20 [[Defence]] to equip, and is part of the [[Shayzien armour (tier 4)]] set. In order to receive the armour, players must have at least 90% [[Shayzien]] [[favour]].

It is dropped by the [[Soldier (tier 4)|tier 4 soldier]] at the [[Combat Ring (Shayzien)|Combat Ring]] in the [[Shayzien Encampment]].
